mysql.item: alter table propertyregister add constraint FK_PROPERTYREGISTER_UPLOADTITLEDEED foreign key (UPLOADTITLEDEED) references SYS_FILE(ID); create index IDX_PROPERTYREGISTER_UPLOADTITLEDEED on propertyregister (UPLOADTITLEDEED);

alter table propertyregister add constraint FK_PROPERTYREGISTER_UPLOADSTAMPDUTY foreign key (UPLOADSTAMPDUTY) references SYS_FILE(ID); create index IDX_PROPERTYREGISTER_UPLOADSTAMPDUTY on propertyregister (UPLOADSTAMPDUTY);
